original_text: And he remained with her six years, hidden in the house of the Lord, while Athaliah reigned over the land.
korean_text: 요아스가 그와 함께 여호와의 성전에 육 년을 숨어 있는 동안에 아달랴가 나라를 다스렸더라

sentences.original_text: And he remained with her six years
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀와 함께 육 년을 머물렀고

sentences.original_text: hidden in the house of the Lord
while Athaliah reigned over the land
